SEARCH
Package controller

Class RemoveToy

java.lang.Object
controller.RemoveToy
public class RemoveToy extends Object
The RemoveToy class provides methods to remove a toy from a toy list.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    (package private) AppMenus
    appMenu
    An instance of AppMenus class to access the menu functionality.
    (package private) ToyList
    toyList
    An instance of ToyList class to add the new toy to the list.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    RemoveToy(ToyList toyList)
    Constructs a RemoveToy object with a given ToyList object.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    private void
    choice(char option, Toy p)
    Performs the removal action based on the user's response to the remove confirmation prompt.
    void
    launchRemove()
    Launches the toy removal process by creating a new AppMenus object, prompting the user for the serial number of the toy to remove, and then calling the remove method.
    void
    remove(String sn)
    Removes a toy with the given serial number from the ToyList object.

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • RemoveToy

      public RemoveToy(ToyList toyList)
      Constructs a RemoveToy object with a given ToyList object.
      Parameters:
      toyList - the ToyList object to remove toys from

  • Method Details

    • launchRemove

      public void launchRemove()
      Launches the toy removal process by creating a new AppMenus object, prompting the user for the serial number of the toy to remove, and then calling the remove method.

    • remove

      public void remove(String sn)
      Removes a toy with the given serial number from the ToyList object.
      Parameters:
      sn - the serial number of the toy to remove

    • choice

      private void choice(char option, Toy p)
      Performs the removal action based on the user's response to the remove confirmation prompt.
      Parameters:
      option - the user's response (y/n) to the remove confirmation prompt
      p - the Toy object to remove
